text: was a Japanese women's football team which played in Nadeshiko League. It founded the league back in 1976. The club was disbanded in 2008. ==Club names== *Kobe FC Ladies: 1976–1988 *Tasaki-Shinju Kobe Ladies: 1989–1990 *Tasaki Kobe Ladies: 1991–1992 *Tasaki Perule FC: 1993–2008 ==Results== Season Domestic League National Cup League Cup League Note League Level Place Tms. 1980 - - - - Semi-finals - 1981 - - 1st Stage - 1982 - - Quarter-finals - 1983 - - Quarter-finals - 1984 - - Quarter-finals - 1985 - - Semi-finals - 1986 - - Semi-final(4th) - 1987 - - Semi-finals - 1988 - - Quarter-finals - 1989 JLSL 1 3rd 6 Semi-finals - 1990 6th 6 Quarter-finals - 1991 6th 10 Quarter-finals - 1992 10th 10 2nd Stage - Relegated to Div.2 1993 JLSL Challenge 2 2nd 4 Quarter-finals - 1994 1st 3 Quarter-finals - Promoted for Div.1 1995 L 1 8th 10 Quarter-finals - 1st Stage : 8th / 2nd Stage : 3rd 1996 7th 10 Quarter- finals Group League 1st Stage : 7th / 2nd Stage : 7th 1997 5th 10 Quarter- finals Group League 1st Stage : 5th / 2nd Stage : 6th 1998 7th 10 Semi-finals Group League 1st Stage : 7th / 2nd Stage : 7th 1999 3rd 8 Champion Semi- finals(4th) 1st Stage : 2nd / 2nd Stage : 2nd 2000 3rd 9 Runners-up - 1st Stage : (WEST)1st 2001 2nd 10 Runners-up - 1st Stage : (WEST)1st 2002 2nd 11 Champion - 1st Stage : (WEST)1st 2003 1st 13 Champion - 1st Stage : (WEST)1st 2004 L1 3rd 8 Semi-finals - 2005 2nd 8 Runners-up - 2006 Nadeshiko Div.1 3rd 8 Champion - 2007 2nd 8 Runners-up Group League 2008 4th 8 Semi- finals - Dissolved ==Honors== ===Domestic competitions=== *Nadeshiko League Division 1 **Champions (1) : 2003 **Runners-up (4) : 2001, 2002, 2005, 2007 *Empress's Cup **Champions (4) : 1999, 2002, 2003, 2006 **Runners-up (4) : 2000, 2001, 2005, 2007 *Nadeshiko Super Cup **Champions (1) : 2006 **Runners- up (1) : 2007 ==Other websites== Category:1970s establishments in Japan Category:1976 establishments in Asia Category:2000s disestablishments in Japan Category:2008 disestablishments in Asia Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Organizations based in Hyōgo Prefecture
